mapper.select: select * from (select * from hotels order by total_score desc, review_count) where rownum <= 3

select * from (select * from hotels where id in (select id from addresses where (sido, sigungu) = (select sido, sigungu from addresses where id = (select address_id from customers where id = #{id}))) order by total_score desc, review_count) where rownum <= 3

select hotel_id from rooms where id not in (select room_id from choose_rooms where reservation_id in (select id from reservations where to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') between start_date and end_date and is_canceled = 0)) group by hotel_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 0
